label: TFW-01
description: NortheastGas Association Wireless Methane Gas Detector

metadata.inclusion: Press and hold the inclusion/exclusion button on the side of the detector for at least 5 seconds. The blue light will begin to flash during pairing and turn solid when inclusion is complete.
metadata.exclusion: Press and hold the inclusion/exclusion button on the side of the detector for at least 5 seconds. The blue light will begin to flash and go out when the device is removed.
metadata.reset: This device will perform a factory reset when the exclusion process is followed.
